EmailTemplate.name: FP CS LA Auto Response Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you - your request {!Case.CaseNumber} has been received!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for reaching out and we apologise for any inconvenience caused.
We will review your case and will get back to you within 24 hours.
ຂໍຂອບໃຈທ່ານ ສຳລັບການຕິດຕໍ່ ແລະ ເຮົາຂໍອະໄພກັບຄວາມບໍ່ສະດວກໃນຄັ້ງນີ້.
ພວກເຮົາຂໍກວດດເບີ່ງກໍລະນີ້ຂອງທ່ານກ່ອນ ເປັນແນວໃດນັ້ນພວກເຮົາຈະຕິດຕໍ່ກັບພາຍໃນ 24 ຊົ່ວໂມງ.
-foodpanda team
